sm demoStateMachine (  ) 

Demonstrate some key behaviors of the topsStateMachine class.

Returns a the topsStateMachine object configured to do a little demo in the Command Window. The object's run() method will start the demo. The object's gui() method will show internal details. 

 sm = demoStateMachine();
 sm.run();
 sm.gui();
